      • getMoney

        public int getMoney(java.lang.String playerID,
           java.lang.String currencyID)
        Returns a variable money. Can be actually implemented once there's a database.
        Parameters:
        playerID - The ID of the player to return the currency amount for
        currencyID - The ID of the currency to return the value of
        Returns:
        The current amount of money for the given player.

      • addMoney

        public boolean addMoney(java.lang.String playerID,
               java.lang.String currencyID,
               int value)
        Adds money to a particular player.
        Parameters:
        playerID - The ID of the player to add the money to
        currencyID - The ID of the currency to be added
        value - The amount of money to add
        Returns:
        True if money was added, false if exception occurs.

      • removeMoney

                  java.lang.String currencyID,
                  int value)
        Removes money from a particular player.
        Parameters:
        playerID - The ID of the player to remove the money from
        currencyID - The ID of the currency to be removed
        value - The amount of money to be removed
        Returns:
        True if money was removed, false if exception occurs.
